[http://sematext.com/services/tech-support.html Lucene, Solr, ElasticSearch Tech Support]
Consulting and Development around [[ElasticSearch]], [[Lucene|Apache Lucene]], [[Solr|Apache Solr]], [[Nutch|Apache Nutch]], [[Hadoop|Apache Hadoop]], [[Hadoop|Apache HBase]], and [http://mahout.apache.org/ Apache Mahout] | products = Performance Monitoring

Database Indexer | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | num_employees = | parent = | subsid = | company_slogan = | homepage = http://www.sematext.com/ | footnotes = }} '''Sematext''' is a [[Brooklyn, NY]] based company providing commercial support, consulting, development and products around Search, [[Big Data]], [[Natural Language Processing]], [[Recommendation Engines]], and [[Text Analytics]]. The company’s services and products are aimed at organizations using or evaluating [[ElasticSearch]], [[Solr]], [[Lucene]], [[Hadoop]], [[HBase]], [[Nutch]]... Sematext was co-founded by Otis Gospodnetić, the co-author of Lucene in Action, the founder of [[Simpy]], and committer on [[Lucene]], [[Solr]], [[Nutch]], [[Apache Mahout]], and [http://lucene.apache.org/openrelevance/ Open Relevance] projects. ==External links== * [http://www.linkedin.com/companies/sematext-international-llc Sematext Profile at LinkedIn] * [http://twitter.com/sematext Sematext on Twitter] [[Category:American companies established in 2007]] [[Category:Technology companies established in 2007]] {{US-company-stub}}
